Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Higgins
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee & Jefferson Park, due to street blockage near Central/Higgins.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Lawrence, Milwaukee and Jefferson Park, due to street blockage near Central/Higgins.

Allow extra travel time.
